ActCanada-Nova Scotia Offshore Petroleum Resources Accord Implementation Act
SubjectCanada–Nova Scotia Offshore Area Occupational Health and Safety Regulations
PrecisCANADA-NOVA SCOTIA OFFSHORE OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish permanent occupational health and safety regulations in each of the Canada-Nova Scotia offshore areas that are appropriate for the unique hazards that exist in remote, offshore petroleum workplaces, and therefore ensure the health and safety of offshore employees and other personnel in the workplace; and (2) provide flexibility to internationally flagged Mobile Offshore Drilling Units and ships to comply with the established health and safety requirements while working in Canada’s offshore Accord areas.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0248 Publication Date: 2021-12-22
